website_summaries.verdict: The inclusion of a charging case as part of this bundle helps the excellent Plantronics BackBeat Go 2 overcome its one serious weakness: short battery life.
pros: The lightweight, reasonably priced Plantronics BackBeat Go 2 wireless stereo headset improves upon the Go 1, with better sound quality and a sweatproof design, The step-up BackBeat Go 2 + Charging Case includes a protective case that has a built-in battery for charging on the go
cons: Battery life isn't great (4.5 hours), so the inclusion of the Charging Case is an important extra

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Awkward
customer_reviews.text: So, these came highly recommended and the review for these were off the charts. I did so much research and finally bought these thinking they'd be a great product. But the one immediate thing I will say is they are SO heavy. It's not really comfortable when they are in your ears. You definitely are constantly aware they are there. The holder and the charging is a bit awkward as well. and as much as I do wish there was no strap, unfortunately there is. I might just be going back to airpods at this point. I had high hopes for these.
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Headphones bricked after 5mo; Plantronics needs a lesson on Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Loved the headphones (esp the idea of wireless headphones), but went bad after only 5months of occasional use. Plantronics customer service is seriously lacking good 'service'... they are telling me that I must pay the return shipping!! Hello? Your product was defective and you want your customers to pay for the return? Paid a premium for Plantronics product and will definitely not buy another Plantronics product. UPDATE: Plantronincs sent me a replacement unit... but they sent me a refurbished item! I really expected to get a new unit, as that's what I paid originally. DO NOT BUY PLANTRONICS... there are so many other options out there with superior products and service.
customer_reviews.author: customer001

customer_reviews.title: Great for Non-Active Activities!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality had me impressed. Mic quality had me impressed. Battery life was enough to get me by through an afternoon of working outside, with the understanding that I could charge these over a siesta or long lunch and be ready to go again. I thought I found exactly what I needed for recreational listening, active untethered listening, and during exercise. That last element killed it for me. I can't get these headphones to stay in. I've swapped ear pieces, manipulated the stabilization elements, and I'm at a loss. I'll continue using them for recreational listening when I want to be untethered, but I'll be looking for something that doesn't fall out as easily
customer_reviews.author: dPrimmy

customer_reviews.title: Adequate though not impressive
customer_reviews.text: While I enjoy many things abut these headphones I still often find myself reaching for my old wired pairs. The audio quality, battery life and connectivity issues all diminish the user experience of this unit. The battery case somewhat makes up for the short battery life but does not lessen the frustration of the unit dying during use. I still have to keep a pair of conventional headphones in my bag for the inevitable midday charge that is required. The tinny sound inherent to many BT headphones have caused me to relegate these to mostly podcast listening. Pros: Compact design, sturdy build Cons: Limited battery life, frequent connection issues, sub par audio quality, outmatched by far cheaper wired units
customer_reviews.author: Ian O

customer_reviews.title: these would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these headphones, as the reviews sounded promising. However, these headphones were a severe let down. They do not stay in my ear when running or even weight training, no matter the size of the ear bud. It also seems to not pair with the iPhone 6. The case is also a nuisance, and it's much easier to just plug the cable directly into the headphones vs. adding an extra step of putting them in the case. If you're looking for wireless headphones for walking, these would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Good start, needs work!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for abouit `2.5 months and overall I am happy with my purchase. The sound quality is good and bluetooth works as advertised. What keeps these headsets from becoming great are the 2 major setbacks that still plague this technology... size and battery life... the speakers are large and bulky... and despite their size to allow more juice, battery only lasts about 2.5 hrs on full use after a full charge. I think due to current limitations, this is as good as it can get, but I will accommodate and enjoy the freedom they provide, however brief it might be. Looking forward to improvements on a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A. Borgen

customer_reviews.title: The more I use them the more I like them.
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to learn to use the full potential of these earbuds. They cancel enough noise to work good on an airline instead of trying to turn up the volume all the way on the wired earbuds. I can watch TV and hear the sound even when there is a lot of noise going on around me. I wear them when I walk on the treadmill or on the rowing machine. The cord never gets tangled like my wired earbuds. I haven't used them for my phone but will probably do that in the future. The more I use them the more I like them. Easy to pair with all my bluetooth devices.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C

customer_reviews.title: Love Plantronics stuff.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound surprisingly good. They are built well in typical Plantronics fashion, and battery life is very good. I like that the carry pouch has an integrated charger and provides a boost to the headphones between uses. I charge the battery pack every 2-3 times I top up the headphones. The only thing I don't like about them is that they won't stay in my ears after a good sweat. That's typical for me of all earbuds though, so YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: David Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good buds but battery life leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile so the sound is good for me. They're comfortable to wear. They fit snugly in my ears. The ear cushions don't come off the buds which is a problem I've had with other buds. Connection to my android phone is great. Battery information right on the screen which is important to me. The sound doesn't break up very often which, again, has been a problem for me with bluetooth buds in the past. It loses a star because of the battery. It lasts me roughly 3.5 hours. I don't go full volume and I don't press the buttons much, but I still get far less than the advertised 4.5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Ali

customer_reviews.title: Decent performance...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the every day for about a month and performance is pretty good for wireless earbuds. Weak base is my only real complaint but for me it's worth the tradeoff to go wireless. Battery life is as advertised. Connects easily to your bluetooth device. Timing on the button-hold duration takes a little practice to avoid inadvertently redial instead of volume/track changes. I'm told that the mic produces an intermittent signal in outdoor/windy conditions, but this is a common problem for the mic style so it seems unfair to expect otherwise on this device.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I did get a dead product but have had multiple sets of these and they are great, usa made and local to California
customer_reviews.author: Scott brittain

customer_reviews.title: Great set of earphones
customer_reviews.text: Tried many before settling on these. Use them to work out mostly. Rotate the rubber ear anchors around until you find the best position for you that keeps them from falling out. Internal battery is good for about 5 earphone charges before "it" has to be charged. Two gripes are 1) the USB cover is awkwardly in the way when charging and 2) sometimes I have to plug in the battery two or three times before the earphones start charging.
customer_reviews.author: William Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I have a mophie case for my iphone 5, and If you have an iphone, you know that the headphone jack "adaptors" that fit thru the mophie headphone jack hole suck and that they start getting a crap signal after only a few uses. These are great since I don't need a wired connection, I dont mess with cords when getting on and off public transit AND it's pretty much hands free control. Battery life could be better but if you get in the habit of plugging them into the case everytime when you're done with them and charging the case every 2-3 days, they'll pay off in spades. Pretty impressed!
customer_reviews.author: AmericanConsumerX

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. They lasted me like a year, and they just begin to break down, first the battery degraded then the earbud. The bluetooth was good, especially now that I've tried others. However, it doesn't justify the pricetag, especially considering what you can get bluetooth earphones nowaday.
customer_reviews.author: Tonny The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: OK headset with very short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April 2014 for something to listen to music while I work. I wanted wireless. I'm no audiophile, but as far as I'm concerned the sound quality has been good. The issue is the battery life. When I first got it, the battery would last between 3.5-4 hours. Over time that amount has gotten smaller. Flash forward 2 years and now the battery lasts about 90 minutes. This is no longer acceptable. I will not be buying another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Maschal

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my wife and another for myself. They're brilliant. I knew Plantronics makes bluetooth units for phone calls and they work well for that, but I wasn't sure about buying something from them for music. I looked at Sony and other recognizable name brands famous for music reproduction and none of them provided the sound quality I expect. I finally tried these because the reviews were really good and I have been blown away by the sound quality. The simple control works very well and immediately worked with my Nexus 5. We couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: SVT666

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the first week, then after that no body could hear what i was saying. I can still use them (a year later) for head phones but not to talk to anyone...so i feel like i kinda wasted my money because i cant use them to make my device hands free. I wouldn't spend the money on the battery pack too. It never worked to charge anything and my head phones kept a charge for my long drives...but that also could be because i couldn't/cant really talk using them
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: These have been a great acquisition. Sound is very good, they have to be situated tightly to get the expected bass, but after a couple of tries they were good to go. Workout in them, other than having periodic expected adjustments they are out of the way and easy to wear. As a phone headset, I haven't been getting complaints for the audibility of the conversation on the other end. The pouch prevents a 5 Star, although it is adequate, it is very difficult to position the headset in order to charge without feeling as thought it is stuffed in and in precarious position. I recommend these, they are well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: dmerg59

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think these are fine for the gym as I use them when I workout. I would recommend replacing the rubber ear pieces as the really don't stay in good. The charging pouch does charge the earphones just fine, but they could have made the pouch a little bigger. The small size makes it hard to cram the headphones back in. Battery life is kinda short but with ear buds, you gotta expect that. I just use them for working out so I charge them after I'm done, not a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: S.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: PROS: compact, great sound quality, fantastic noise cancelling, mic is much smaller which is great, price was great at $49. CONS: when charging sometimes indicates it is charging when its not, pouch is a little too small
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Concept - Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I started out enjoying these headphones. I thought they worked perfectly and the case was an excellent idea. About 3 months later and probably only 15 or so hours of use, the headphones would no longer charge. If you google this issue, you will see that this is a much larger issue. I would not recommend these headphones to anyone. I would 100% return this faulty product if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Duffie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but don't fit
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones with quality sound and easy Bluetooth functionality. The extra battery in the case is very handy. One very big problem though is that they are way too big for my ears so they don't actually stay in my left ear. Most earbuds aren't sized for women's generally smaller ear canals and these follow suit. I hope the company comes out with more size options because these are really well designed otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: PlushPippin

customer_reviews.title: Like this product for the value
customer_reviews.text: Like this product for the value. Sounds decent, and has extra earbuds, securely fits to the ear so it wont fall out during work-outs. I wish it had more battery life. The pouch gives you 14.5 hours of batter life (so it says), I would rather have increased battery life. Other than that for $68 these are pretty are a great value. Jaybirds will cost double the price for new models.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Y Kim

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Bluetooth Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn't pair the earbuds with my Android cell. I thought they were defective. I contacted the vendor who responded within 24 hours. In the meantime I tried pairing it again and it worked. I was doing something wrong. This is the second Plantronics Bluetooth Earbuds I have brought - lost the first one. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: No Battery Life.....
customer_reviews.text: Cool Product, really liked the design. Highly Disappointed in the battery life. Tried them for a full week and received the message that Battery Life is Full and at approximately 1 hour it would state Low Battery Life and then shut off about 10 minutes later. After this happened several times (at least 8 full charges), I returned to my old wired set and am Returning the product. Any recommendations for Bluetooth with an acceptable battery life, for example 3 hours that can be verified by an actual user?
customer_reviews.author: Madman

customer_reviews.title: I hate to give a Plantronics device a poor review because ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give a Plantronics device a poor review because they are a really great company and they do produce some great devices. However, this headset was a disappointment. Now, the sound was great and they're plenty comfortable but here's the problem. They would only play music for about 3 hours before they died. As I travel a lot and many of my travel days take the entire day, 3 hours of play time was insufficient. So, I went and bought a pair of the LG Tone Pro HBS-750 and couldn't be happier since they last over 8 hours. Now I just need to figure out who to give the Plantronics to.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, S*** life
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, decent bass. Battery lasted about 2 hours or a little more depending on volume. They stay in my ears pretty good and rarely get snagged on anything. Charge time is pretty fast and with the case it makes it easy to charge while in class or car. After a year and 4 months they crapped out on me (beyond the one year warranty). They will light up when charging but won't turn on or make any sound when pressing buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok, I would say great but I'm a bass junkie so that's the only expectation they didn't meet but I know that before I bought them. I used these everyday to workout and I've never had an issue with them. They never fall out when I'm working out and they have great reception. I workout at home and when I leave the gym downstairs to grab something to drink upstairs in the kitchen I can still hear my music streaming clearly. Would highly recommend these to anyone who works out all the time but hates tangled wires or just wires everywhere in general. Hope this review helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good job for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for running or mowing the lawn. Phone stays in the pocket, untethered by a cord. Unlike some reviews, I personally don't mind the ear-to-ear cable on the back of my neck, can hardly feel it. The three button control is great and the unit charges quickly, with decent, approximately 2 hour battery time. Sound quality is average, but hey, it's bluetooth, and it's not expected, for this application to be an audiophile's dream.
customer_reviews.author: SFW

customer_reviews.title: Low quality charging case and poorly designed earbud structure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in August 2015 to use to go to the gym and listen to music from my phone. I also bring these with me as I travel. The last month the charging case stopped charging. It seems like the connector is low quality and broke rather fast. The earbuds seem to fall out of my ear pretty frequently, as the holding piece is not well designed. I am no audiophile but I do like the sound quality. I would not have bought the charging case if I knew it would break in a few months...
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good but.. Found a Bug
customer_reviews.text: The sound is ok not the best, one problem that I found with this, is if you have 2 or more things paired with your phone the music with this earbuds sounds in mono. At the beginning I thought something was wrong with it, then played around with and found the problem. I had to close all Bluetooth connections and clean the memory and then reconnected the earbuds and then the music was in stereo. I am using note 3 and I don’t know if it is something with the phone or the earbuds. Everything else is basically the same like the rest of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing! The range is pretty great. I just wanted to clarify some things that others have said. One of the big things that people talk about is that these headphones won't fall out of your ears, unfortunately that isn't entirely true. I had a hard time making these stay in my ears with any of the ear buds they were shipped with UNTIL I realized that using the ear stabilizers keep them attached like glue. So, everything that everyone says about these things staying in is completely true as long as you use the ear stabilizers!
customer_reviews.author: CSD Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for wireless headphones! Not great for working out
customer_reviews.text: The ear pieces don't feel as snug as I would like them to be. I guess I'm just used to the kind that go around the ear. The quality is great. Obviously the bass isn't the best but apparently that's normal when it comes to wireless. I use them for working out and it gets pretty good range before it cuts out. I did a lot of research for wireless headphones and these are probably best for around $100. The charging case is nice just wish it was a little bigger. These headphones are probably meant more for everyday activities. Working out with them I tend to continuously push them back in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when my wired Beats by dre buds stopped working due to frayed wires. I haven't used them too much yet, but when I have, they fit well and have decent sound. I'm still trying to get used to the controls and I haven't yet paired it with multiple devices, just my iphone. But so far so good. The only negative is battery life. I went from a full charge to low battery within an hour of use. I'm not sure if I did something to cause that or if it's just poor battery life overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth head phone set
customer_reviews.text: Great bluetooth head phone set. They fit great. Battery charges fast and lasts long. Set came in a really great package with 3 sizes of earbuds, a portable charging case- will provide an additional 1hr of time, standard charge cord and plug. The set functions well and linked up with my iPhone quickly. Drawbacks is that it does not seem to be compatible with my Playstation 3 (PS3) and that it hard to switch from the headset bluetooth connection to my car's connection. Very happy with this product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: michael jimenez

customer_reviews.title: You just found the best wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Battery could last a little bit longer, but the product is great. The charging thing is kind of wierd and doesn't store the earbuds that good but works and can give you some extra juice. I don't think it is that worth it, but works. These earbuds are the best ones i've ever had, the sound is good, bass is good and treble is great. It is very light and you almost forget you are using it. With this guy i don't need to use my iPhone in and armband or in the pocket so it let's me leave my phone in the floor or in the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Brazilian Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Scrap this product
customer_reviews.text: Not earbuds by a long shot! - I read the reviews before buying them but I was skeptical of them. But now, I gave it a two stars to bias the results to get people's attention. Don't buy this product! -Too Heavy -Too Big -Sound = mediocre -They do NOT stay in your ear!!!!! (no matter which insert you use) I got a lot of complaints from people "hearing" me on the other side while on the phone. I didn't want to return them because is not the seller's fault. Plantronics is a good brand, they need to scrap this product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Garciarubio

customer_reviews.title: ... and the headphones are a quality product and sound good and work well for me
customer_reviews.text: tricky to stay in ears as other reviews have said but i can deal with that and the headphones are a quality product and sound good and work well for me. I did pay extra for the charging case and have not really used it yet. I think it will come in handy for travel because the headphones do run down after a couple hours? or so. I honestly have not tracked the time, but I'm always surprised when they run down since of course wired headphones never do. :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor battery life on earbuds...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these might replace my LG Tone headset since they are a little bulky. I like the fit of the Plantronics, but the battery life sucks. They don't seem to go into hibernation mode as readily as advertised and more than an hour of continuous music and you need to charge them. Overall a good product, but if you want to use a bluetooth headset for music continously; past 2-3 hours, these are not the ones you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard J. Gray II

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies almost immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these just over a month ago. Battery lasted at first but this last week it started dying really quickly. I charge it every night so the battery shouldn't be dying this quickly. I've had these for only a month and the battery lasts about an hour... so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I'm glad I went with these instead of Jaybirds. The fit is perfect. I was surprised at the great sound too. They do not slide out, and they cancel out surrounding noise very well. I get about 4 hours of play time before having to charge them. The included carrying/charging case is a great perk. I'm extremely happy with them and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good product Glad I bought.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. Distance range is also very surprising. Button functionality is solid with my S5 Active. It pulls in many of the music and phone functions. You may need to check your OS version first to ensure it will allow the battery level widget and it must be downloaded. You will also have to search for the one your smart phone need as they do not provide links.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rob

customer_reviews.title: not perfect but ok
customer_reviews.text: just received it yesterday. I have to say as a music lover i like my music loud with a lot of base, the back beats are not very loud but offer more of a mid level volume. The base cracks at high volume but i notice it happens with music video's with high base. If you're expecting high volume high base quality like me. this is not for you, I have yet to find a wireless ear bud product that meets my demands. although sound is clear i just think it's ok, but not awesome.
customer_reviews.author: wolfchants

customer_reviews.title: They hold charge nicely, controls are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have owned these beauties for over a year and still running strong. I have made them my gym earbuds as sweat appears to have no affect on them unlike other earbuds I've used. They hold charge nicely, controls are easy to use, and nice notifications. My only grievance is the connecting wires between the earbuds, it can be a bit of a disturbance at times.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Mine already broke. Left side won’t play, right side cuts out. When they worked they were pretty decent. Except if you sweat a lot they just fall out. Extremely disappointed and they will not refund/replace the defective pair so don’t make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kettelkamp

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and the charge lasts me about 2 to 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds work very well, they are a little bulky and tend to fall out of the ear with a lot of movement. I have tried all the ear pieces from small to large and there is no difference to me. The sound is great and the charge lasts me about 2 to 3 hours depending on volume. Now the charging case would only get 1 star from me. I must have gotten a faulty one, it won't charge the buds for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Smouse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - swap out with cushier bud covers if your fit isn't perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great all around. I love these and use them everyday for about 3 hours total. I travel a good deal for work and the charging case is awesome for when you know you're not going to have access to power for a while. I had a cheap pair of WalMart JVC Mashmallow buds. I liked the ear plugs on those better than the Plantronics (they fit and stayed in much better) so I simply swapped them out. May be worth the extra $10 if you're looking for a better / more stable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Fairly decent
customer_reviews.text: As far as play time, this has been one of the longest running earbuds I've ever owned. But one of the earbuds eventually stopped working after about a year or so. I think it was a decent pair overall for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba Reams

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with the Charging Case...works for 6 months only
customer_reviews.text: It takes a couple months for me to get used to the size of the ear piece; i guess my ears are smaller than most. I was starting to love it because there aren't any cords in the way. I bought it in February and in August, the charging case doesn't work. It still works when i connect the earphone directly to the charger. I spent extra for the charging case and it only worth 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wu

customer_reviews.title: They sound pretty good, but don't get very loud
customer_reviews.text: They sound pretty good, but don't get very loud. They are pretty small and comfortable to wear and it's nice not having a cord leading to my phone all the time. Battery life is not great, though, I can usually get through a full album and a little more before needing to recharge it. I recommend getting the one that has the portable charging pouch to get a little more time out on the road with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dariushd

customer_reviews.title: Good with important draw back.
customer_reviews.text: Hi there. Those earbuds are good. Sound from telephone and music is very good. buttons for controling the earbuds are not distinctive enough. AND: They do not hold very well in my ears and constantly come off. Now that part is bad. Even if they come with 3 kinds of bud sizes. Make absolutely sure you order them with the portable recharge, as they sure do not have long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Claude M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I purchased this product for A) the positive reviews B) the price. They were decent headphones while they lasted; however, they only lasted 2 months. After owning them for less than two months, they died. I used them daily, kept them charged and cleaned. I was happy with the sound quality and the price; however, the lifespan was completely disappointing for me. They died a few weeks after the return policy expired.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the sound quality for this price. I'm sure that high-end (and high-priced) units would seriously out-perform these, but I simply don't use them enough to justify spending five times what these cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound! was a bit skeptical before purchasing about how the bass would sound, for i listen to a lot of house music. Must say the bass is spot on! only thing i would like to see different is the charge. Wish it lasted a bit longer, for i am in the gym 5 days a week for only 1 hour and it really only last me about 3.5 days on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Bowe C. Packer

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ok I used this three times and love it. No wire attach and I worked out with this and never once it came loose. This used to be a big issues with other headphone. I also like the fact that it is sweat resistant because I wear them in steam room. Things I like: Sweat resistant Multiple devices connections by switching Battery status prompt with voice and LED
customer_reviews.author: Anh P. Nguyen, MD

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly, and are exactly what they say they are. Work great as a headset, but no so great for music. I love Bluetooth headphones, but these are just not for any degree of audiophile. There is no base what-so-ever, regardless of what others may say in here. I won't return them, as I knew what I was buying when I got them. Just be aware, and don't expect Bose level sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Poor Battery
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of bluetooth earbuds I've had in the last two years. As far as audio quality these are far better then what I have owned in the past. The only downside is their battery lasts about 1h45m-2h15m. Great if you are looking for a decent workout headphone. Also the case these come in holds and extra battery so you can charge on the way.
customer_reviews.author: REBUILT CUB

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless addition for a workout
customer_reviews.text: Easily connected to my phone. Stays in my ear during my sweaty treadmill workouts. I have walked all around the gym, ~100 feet without it ever breaking the connection. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to go wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product and crappy service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same item twice. Both times they worked great for a few weeks and then just stopped working -- wouldn't hold a charge. I had a rough time with Amazon's customer service, although they ultimately came through for me and refunded my money. I REALLY wanted a pair of wireless/Bluetooth earbuds and am really sad that these Plantronics didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Bob1

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: The item did not work and there was no effort to correct the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Colston

customer_reviews.title: Was nice to use this Bluetooth on my computer to
customer_reviews.text: Was nice to use this Bluetooth on my computer to watch movies, but not so good for the cell phone. It worked fine but it falls out of your ear easily and the person on the other end of the phone hears loud annoying background noise if the cord rubs your clothing and it picks up to much background noise if you are outside near any kind of traffic, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: ok but cheaper ones work just as well i think
customer_reviews.text: they work but when they start losing battery power they get very fuzzy sounding i know its casue the connection ain't that great but i had some 20 dollar china knock offs that did not do this and if a20 dollar cheap set can do it so should a more expensive name brand
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Drew

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother...spoke too soon
customer_reviews.text: This headphone arrived with a dead nonchargeable battery. Seller wants me to pay return shipping. Edit: After more than 24 hours on the direct charge it looks like maybe the buds are alive after all
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, they are well made and sound fantastic! I forgot what bass sounded like until I popped these and listened to rap album. I recommend buying a clip to pin the wire to your shirt to keep the slack loose. The mic is so good that when I talk on the phone the other person can hear everything I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: Hardliner Bullet

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent music quality. At full volume battery lasts longer than 2 hours. Phone calls are annoying in stereo. At first the fit didn't seem to fit right but they didn't fall out and they got more comfortable as I got used to them. The cord could be about 4 inches longer, it kind of grips your neck as you turn left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Really nice earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Very good overall. Several options for a good fit, which is essential for good sound. But they do need adjustments especially if you do any significant movement These are not good for listening while being active. But they are so easy to carry with you and the sound quality is very good. Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Harkavy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: There are only 2 small issues I have with these. They are a bit big for ear buds and the sound isn't as full as I'd like. Even with the smallest tips they still feel pretty big hanging out of my ear. This is somewhat understandable since they have to build that bluetooth tech into them. The other issue is the sound isn't very full. It's a bit low on the volume and when I enable the EQ on my ipod and change the sound, the sound doesn't change in the ear buds. At least not a noticeable change anyways. Other than that they are great. I have them synced to my ipod, iphone and ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce N. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These earphones will probably be better in 10 years
customer_reviews.text: These earphones will probably be better in 10 years, after the technology has improved and the kinks have been worked out. My three main issues with them, in order of most frustrating to least, are as follows: 1) The left bud stopped working altogether after 6 months of light use. I have not yet sent earbuds in for warranty repairs. 2) They sometimes connect automatically (via bluetooth) to my iPod touch 5 gen., but most of the time I have to go into settings and manually select to sync the two devices. 3) The sound quality is good, but the highest volume setting isn't as high as I would like for it to be.
customer_reviews.author: William Joseph Strader

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, doesn't come with battery case
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with the case they advertise. The headset itself is great. Lasts about 4 hrs listening to music; good volume, range, sound, comfort; charge time is short and they stay in ear just fine while working out. Would have been a 5 star, but its irritating when you don't get what they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Enjoyable Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought these earbuds a month ago I've been using them every day. They don't weigh much so it doesn't bother you much for long uses. The sound quality is very good but you will still hear some static here in there but you don't mind it that much. The batteries last like 4 hours of continuous music play. The phone quality is pretty good as well. Overall I'm really happy with this purchase since these are my first Bluetooth earbuds. If you have problems with the initial iPhone connection open the Bluetooth settings and hold the Plantronics center button for 10 seconds till you see PLT_BBTG02 in devices and connect it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Eli R.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with pirchase
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these since March of 2015 and within the last 2-3 months I have noticed they do not hold a charge longer than 30 minutes when completely charged. I am very unhappy with this since I've only owned them for an 1 1/2 years. Had I known the battery would not last long I would have never purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kilb

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the seal (or lack thereof) nor do I like ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound, but pitiful battery life. I lost my jaybirds bluebud X and decided to buy these as they are comparable in style and cheaper. I do not like the seal (or lack thereof) nor do I like the awkwardness of the cord which kinda dangles and hangs out away from your head. The case is nice and unique, but if I'm not home, I like to keep my earphones in. The battery life of this item is subpar. This may have worked for me if I hadn't been spoiled by the bluebuds X. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: LM Edwards

customer_reviews.title: great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why people are complaining about these headphones. They work really great and I have no problem with them so far. The case comes in as a plus and its great. You can charge and also protect your headphones. One thing I would love from those headphones are more bass and louder volume. Also the light indicator somewhere easier to see. Overall its a good workout headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Johntt

customer_reviews.title: Very clear sound and its nice to have the case as a back up charger ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones at work and I get around 7-7.5 hours of use out of them. The range with my phone is decent, though I do tend to keep my phone in my pocket just in case. Very clear sound and its nice to have the case as a back up charger when not in range of a wall plug.
customer_reviews.author: sbpfit51

customer_reviews.title: 6 months old and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I believe everyone knows the quality of these phones, but lots of people are having problems fitting it on, including me. My solution was to purchase a the largest fit of comply foams and replaced it with the original plasticky ones. WALA~ Bass and mids improved by leaps and bounds but the Highs is the biggest weakness of this phones. Great deal tho considering the wireless convenience and great music quality of this product. Definitely looking out for the upgrade of the next replacement!
customer_reviews.author: xavier low

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and it works great with my S5 Active
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it works great with my S5 Active. Bought another for my wife and it will not stay connected to my wife's S6 Active. It just says connected........ not connected.
customer_reviews.author: Zarniwoop

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purcased this item as a gift, and plan on getting a second pair for myself. The headphones are very clear, and have good range. I was able to leave my cell phone on in my living room and walk across the house without any glitching. They ear buds are comfortable and noise cancelling. The item comes with 3 different size rubber attachments to fit different ear sizes. The charging case is small and functional, I love that it allows you to charge the headphones on the go. The volume control is an added plus! These were worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: 3+ years, still great
customer_reviews.text: Owned these for 3+ years. Two nights ago, I accidentally sent them through the clothes wash. They're working today. They still have good thump. The sound quality is still great. I still enjoy running with them. I do recommend the clothing clip to prevent them from being pulled out of your ears while running.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher V. Shumake

customer_reviews.title: The volume up button does not work after one year ...
customer_reviews.text: The volume up button does not work after one year. I have a much older well working headphones... Always fall out from my ear when I work out or bicycling. I tried different tips (there are 3 sizes) but did not help. The headset is more for phone calls from an office but not for fitness. I wish to return them back earlier...and get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Olesya

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are dissapointing. Everything about them works well, the range is good, battery life is decent, pairing is easy, and the sound is really good. However, their fit is terrible. I've followed evey instruction on how to make them fit properly, I've tried switching all of the actual rubber ear buds that come with it and I still run into problems. They constantly fall out of my ear with the slightest change in position, and when am able to get them to stay in my ears I have had to push them so far into my ear canal that it causes a pressure difference and discomfort similar to a sudden altitude change.
customer_reviews.author: Issak Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy...
customer_reviews.text: My problem with these ear buds is that I have a real problem keeping them in my ears and the battery life is only, maybe, 2 hours. I like the charging case but I would like to not charge these ear buds so often. I wear them at work and end up charging them more than I can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely satisfied with the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before finally selecting these earbuds. It was the review over at iLounge that convinced me to try them out. I'm completely satisfied with the sound quality, workmanship, design, fit and feel. In fact, I was a little surprised at just how natural they sound. Didn't think Bluetooth buds could sound so good. I hate the expression, but have to say Plantronics exceeded my expectations. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Haake

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy... Worst headphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for Christmas 2013 and they stopped working after 6 months. When they were working they would cut in and out. Bought another pair to replace the old pair and they arrived not working so they were returned. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Karrah

customer_reviews.title: Charge length and weight/size are not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: While the connection is very good, the headphones hold a charge for 3 hours - not the 5 listed. And possibly I have a faulty extra battery but it doesn't charge my headphones. Also the earpiece is large and heavy, and starts to hurt my ears within an hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Motorola S-9 Bluetooth headset. I generally use these to connect to my computer to watch movies and listen to music. The Motorola really just kind of hung in my ears and didn't stop any of the outside noise. These are truly noise canceling. With the S-9's I sometimes had to fiddle with them to get them to pair. This headset pairs up in literally 2 seconds. Personally I think they sound great too. This is the type of fitment, build, ease of use and sound I was looking for when I bought this headset and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: great sound, and a bit over 3 hours which ...
customer_reviews.text: great sound, and a bit over 3 hours which is good considering their size. Not good on freeway motorcycle rides since they stick out and the wind will knock them out of place. Stay in pretty well during high movement workouts like heavybag work and trail running
customer_reviews.author: Gustav

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth connection is quick and easy. I particularly like the voice cues for power
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very compact and the case with a built-in recharging battery adds to the convenience. The Bluetooth connection is quick and easy. I particularly like the voice cues for power, battery level, and connection status instead of cryptic LED codes that I can't see when wearing the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Laser Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great, and are comfortable compared to other earbuds I've purchased (even after trying multiple tips with those devices). I was particularly worried about comfort, considering the added weight of batteries and Bluetooth radio to the ear pieces. That doesn't seem to be an issue, even with extended wear (about 4 hours in a single sitting, haven't used in an active environment yet). The case is OK, but the headphones really don't fit well with the battery taking up space in the case. I wouldn't take this as a hit against the headphones themselves, but against this particular product because it includes the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Toney

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for running but terrible if you try to use ...
customer_reviews.text: The microphone is lousy. When I picked up a phone call in an area that does not have a lot of background noise, the caller on the other end cannot hear me. Not bad for running but terrible if you try to use it for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Jwang

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound- but some issues
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is ok, but they are hard to stabilize if you are working out. The Jabra Sport to me are still the best if a stable fit is needed. Also, the case stopped working shortly after I purchased it. Happily Amazon allowed me to return it. Bluetooth functionality was fine, as was phone function.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for audiophiles
customer_reviews.text: It is delivered in a good package, and we find the charging case quite useful (a very nice design). The connection is reliable (unlike another Bluetooth earphone I have), and the microphone is acceptable. The sound quality is not for audiophiles though, and, as many people pointed out, they are big for many ears. You may need some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Wu Yongwei

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Fine while in your ears!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get them to stay in my ears... I have tried all of the sizes provided in the packaging... while walking, or long periods of sitting still on trips or at work they always work their way out of my ears... I also have small ears...
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Love

customer_reviews.title: All around a good the adjustable ear pieces are nice to have they ...
customer_reviews.text: All around a good the adjustable ear pieces are nice to have they charge pretty quickly and the extra travel battery case is also very nice to have. The only problem i have with this product is that they are easy to slip off if you aren't paying attention to them, and that they cause me to have headache after long periods of wear. All in all great product worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: love the fact there is no cord
customer_reviews.text: I seen my boss wear something similar but I did not like his due to they have wrap around his ears. there are amazingly comfortable and I can hope from my work phone, to personal phone and even onto my computer with no issues. it is also a nice added feature the case is also a charging station.
customer_reviews.author: Steve_o19

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality with the quality, not with control...
customer_reviews.text: These sound pretty good, very clear. I mostly use them for voice content podcasts as I travel to and from work. When listening to my Google music stream they seem to lack bass, but that could be the stream, I will check local content soon. But I am disappointed that I can not control my audio tracks as suggested in the manual, volume buttons work but I can not forward/rewind through tracks or jump to the next one. Would this be OS or app related?
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. Earbuds fit well and are well designed to stay in the ear while you're moving about. Love the freedom from cords! Wish the battery lasted more than two hours so I could wear them all morning while cleaning the house and listening to my audible book. But no problem using corded earbuds while these re-charge.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: It OK, not a premium sound but good enough money wise. Not comfortable in ears and needs a variety in the size of Fit Stabilizers. Hardly stay in ear maybe because the large size of Earbuds, I think smaller size will be more comfortable. Battery life is OK, as mentioned in the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Hany Mohammad Shendy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a year, then battery life gradually failed to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: meg howard

customer_reviews.title: Great workout headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome workout headphones. Great for a run or in the gym. Stay in my ear much better than what I expected. While you can take a phone call, I wouldn't use these as a primary Bluetooth headset. The mic pics up everything and its difficult for people to hear. Its fine for taking a short call but not good for extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a week now and they're great. Pairing them with my S4 Active and Tab 7.7 was easy. Connecting to my device was much faster then some BT headsets and speakers that I've used. Sound wise, they're excellent. Just the right amount of clarity and base. Good balance. I've read some reviews that they don't fit well and that was my initial concern. Buy I'm glad they fit perfectly. Still trying to figure out how the stabilisers work as I'm not sure I'm using them correctly. But I do have one gripe; the cable microphonics is more obvious than I would prefer when wearing them for my runs. Otherwise, they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Leong

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat Go 2 Wireless Hi-Fi Earbud Headphones with Charging Case - Compatible with iPhone and other Smart Devices - Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPlantronics Backbeat GO 2 wireless ear buds and charging case deliver immersive audio for your non-stop life, so you can lose the cord, free your music, and still take that call. Designed to seal in the bass and block out the noise, you'll quickly lose yourself in the soundtrack of your day. Whether you're sweating out the stress or swaying to the beat, the military-grade moisture resistance protects against an intense workout or a coffee spill. If you tuck it away and forget to power it off, the Deep Sleep hibernation mode keeps ear buds charged and ready to use for up to six months. Unleash your music and GO.

AMAZON.COM



BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds (view larger). NO CORDS, NO COMPROMISE
Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds and charging case deliver immersive audio for your non-stop life with up to 14.5 hours of use on the go. Once you experience the rich bass, crisp highs, and natural midtones, you'll want every minute the charging case offers so you can lose yourself in the soundtrack of your day. 

BackBeat GO 2 earbuds are designed to seal in the bass and block out the noise -- so lose the cord, free your music, and still take that call. There are three sizes of eartips and two stabilizers to provide a secure, comfortable fit.

STAY CHARGED, STAY MOVING
Thanks to the protective soft charging case, you'll get up to 14.5 hours of listening time with the BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds (from fully charged case). Two LEDs on the charging case provide key information. Press the battery icon on the case and one LED blinks to show you the battery level of the case. While charging, the LED on the case that shows the earbuds' status will blink every ten seconds until fully charged. Just 20 minutes connected to the charging case adds up to another hour of listening time.

Without using the case for additional on-the-go charging, you'll get up to 4.5 hours of listening time and up to 5 hours of talk time from these ultralight earbuds, as well as up to 10 days of standby time. If you forget to connect to the charging case, the DeepSleep hibernation mode keeps the earbuds charged for up to six months, ready for use. 

UNLEASH YOUR MUSIC AND GO
The Bluetooth-enabled BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds easily slip into your pocket, but still pack a full-on stereo sound. You can listen to music, chat with friends, or watch movies on your tablet -- even play games on the go.

A convenient inline controller lets you manage calls, play and pause music, and skip tracks while your smartphone is conveniently tucked away in your pocket or bag. An inline microphone captures your voice so you sound clear and natural during phone calls.

MOISTURE PROTECTION
You can rely on the BackBeat GO 2 to work as hard as you do -- through rain, sweat, and the inevitable coffee spill. BackBeat GO 2 earbuds are protected against sweat and moisture damage by P2i technology. The nano-coating is applied during the manufacturing process, resulting in invisible liquid repellent properties that also makes the earbuds more reliable, wherever your busy life takes you.

ONSCREEN BATTERY METER
Keep track of the battery life of your BackBeat GO 2 earbuds with a handy battery meter that automatically displays onscreen for iPhone and iPad. The free Plantronics Battery Meter widget enables a battery meter on smartphones running Android 4.0 and later and tablets running Android 3.0 and later.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 earbuds, soft charging case with rechargeable battery, Micro USB charger, three eartips (small, medium, large), fit stabilizers, quick start guide

BACKBEAT GO 2 EARBUDS + CHARGING CASE, BLACK
KEY FEATURES
 * Earbuds seal in the crisp highs, natural mid-tones, and rich bass so you hear every nuance
   
   
 * Military-grade moisture resistance and rugged, tangle-free cable won't let you down
   
   
 * Included charge case enables up to 14.5 hours listen time
   
   
 * Just 20 minutes connected to the charging case adds another hour of listening time
   
   
 * DeepSleep mode puts earbuds into hibernation when away from phone to extend battery life 
   
   
 * Inline controls make it easy to take calls, skip tracks, and adjust volume
   
   
 * Multiple fit options secure earbuds for active use and all-day wearing
   
   


Includes three sizes of eartips (view larger). 
For use with Bluetooth-enabled smartphones (view larger). 
Freedom from cords (view larger). 
Also for use with tablets -- both Android and iOS (view larger). Models BackBeat 903+ BackBeat GO BackBeat GO2 BackBeat GO2 + Charging Case Audio Quality 14mm speaker drivers plus enhanced bass 1st generation 6mm speaker drivers 3rd generation 6mm speaker drivers plus enhanced bass Listening Time Up to 7 hours Up to 4.5 hours Up to 4.5 hours Standby Time Up to 168 hours Up to 240 hours Up to 6 months with DeepSleep hibernation mode Device Connectivity Single-device connection Single-device connection 8-device memory for easy switching Stability and Fit Three-way adjustment with contoured eartips Standard in-ear design with stabilizers Redesigned ear tips and stabilizers Play & Volume Controls Dedicated buttons on ear and behind ear Standard inline controller 2nd generation inline controller with intuitive, tactile controls P2i Sweat Resistant Technology No P2i coated for sweat and water resistance* P2i coated for sweat and water resistance Call Experience Two standard omni microphones plus Standard omni microphone plus full duplex echo cancellation MEMS microphone plus full duplex echo cancellation Storage Case Soft mesh storage case No No Ballistic nylon rechargeable case 

Up to 10 more hours of added listening time

LED status charge level indicators blink every 10 seconds when earbuds are plugged in

* Available on models released after October, 2012
feature_bullets: WIRELESS EARBUDS: Bluetooth enabled cordless headphones allow you to lose the cord while providing an enhanced and immersive audio experience.
LONG LASTING BATTERY LIFE: Includes a charging case which offers up to 14.5 hours of listening time with 20 minutes of charge time giving an extra hour of battery life.
COMPACT: Bluetooth enabled wireless earbuds easily slip into your pocket making them perfect travel headphones while still packing a full-on stereo sound.
COMFORT: Multiple fit options give secure earbuds for active and all-day wearing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars1,408 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Fit Stabilizers, Soft Charging Case With Rechargeable Battery, 3-Eartips, Ipad, And Other Leading Smart Devices - Black, Plantronics Backbeat Go 2 Earbuds, Plantronics Backbeat Go 2 Wireless Hi-Fi Earbud Headphones With Charging Case - Compatible With Iphone, Android, Micro Usb Charger, Quick Start Guide
